text: Futhi uma nehlukanisa nabesifazane ngaphambili kokuba nibathinte nibe senibaqokele okwabo ngakho-ke (banikeni) ingxenye yalokho enibaqokele kona ngaphandle kokuthi kona bengakuthathi noma kungathathwa yilowo esandleni sakhe okunesibopho somshado futhi ukuthi nikuyeke kusondelene nokwenza okuhle, futhi ningakhohlwa izenzo ezinhle phakathi kwenu ngempela uMvelinqangi ungokubonayo enikwenzayo
